title: The NaNoWriMo Workbook
description: Make the most of National Novel Writing Month! Based on the principles of the highly intuitive Paperclip Method, The NaNoWriMo Workbook is your guide to an inspired, productive November.  A series of 500-word writing prompts will help you get the bones of your story on the page. From there, learn how to write a compelling beginning, create complex characters, find the thematic heart of your novel, establish point of view, and craft a plot that keeps readers turning pages. Find the best structure for your novel and bring the story to a satisfying conclusion. Learn tips for effective dialogue and master the art of conflict. Discover how associative thinking can lead you into unexpected territory, adding depth and dimension to your story.  Whether you want to write your book in 30 days or 300, The NaNoWriMo Workbook will help you get there. Packed with information on the nuts and bolts of narrative craft, this workbook is an essential resource for the first-time novelist.
author: Fiction Attic Press
